title: Wall Street Breakfast August 14: Currency Jitters Ease

description: Our top stories today: Currency jitters ease; key reports reveal the effects of US tariffs on China’s economy; and Coca-Cola is acquiring a minority stake in BodyArmor. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
